subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets addressed last season’s woes against left-handers by signing Moises Alou to balance the lineup. Alou has done his part, but his success is only a small part of the team’s improvement.
snippet: The Mets addressed last season’s woes against left-handers by signing Moises Alou to balance the lineup. Alou has done his part, but his success is only a small part of the team’s improvement.
